column5: Need to stock up on a few Salmon again, to me it is the treat of the year!  We go to the Pine River northwest of Aliston but southwest of the Borden base, has anybody been there and is there any salmon due to lack of rain.....  Need to take a day from business and and head up there, really do not want to go to Nottawasaga unless there isn't any in Pine.....  Lorissa
